item.title: SOS: The One iPhone Setting You Need to Know to Protect Your Cellular Data!
item.description: Introduction We all know how important it is to protect our data, especially when it comes to our cellular data. With the rise of mobile devices, it’s more important than ever to make sure our data is secure and protected. Fortunately, there’s a simple setting on your iPhone that will help protect your cellular data: SOS. Definition of Cellular Data Cellular data is the data that is used when you access the internet using your phone’s cellular connection.
